Metadata.Title: Ensure that Privileges Are Dropped Successfully
Metadata.DirectLink: Ensure that Privileges Are Dropped Successfully

Content.Data:
What to Do

When you drop privileges, ensure that you have dropped them successfully to avoid CWE-273. As protection mechanisms in the environment get stronger, privilege-dropping calls may fail even if it seems like they would always succeed.

Additional Resources

  • For more information about "CWE-273: Improper Check for Dropped Privileges", please see http://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/273.html
